ApproveOffer(uint256,(address,uint64,add.details: Settlement offer was approved and the escrow was settled and claimed

params.amounts: amounts (in token) sent to addresses that were eligible to any shares and fees from the escrow
params.blockTime: Timestamp of when the settlement was minted
params.latestSettlementOffer: Splits (in bips) in the settlement offer that was approved

Challenge(uint256,uint256,(address,uint6.details: Emitted when a challenge is sent for an escrow

params.blockTime: Timestamp when the challenge was minted

SettlementOffer(uint256,uint256,uint16[2.details: Settlement offer (i.e. offer to split the escrow by defined shares) was sent by one of the parties

params.blockTime: Timestamp for when the offer was minted
params.escrowId: ID of the scrow for which a settlement was offered
params.latestSettlementOffer: Splits [buyer's split, seller's split] as defined in the offer (in bips)

params.escrowId: ID of the escrow for which the offer is sent
params.validation: the settlement proposal that must be equal to an offer sent by the other party

params.escrowId: Id of the escrow that's being challenged
Id of the escrow to get settlement offer details for

returns._0: Returns zero values in the returned object's fields if there's been no offer

params.escrowId: ID of the escrow for which the offer is sent
params.newSplit: the new settlement proposal ([buyerSplit, sellerSplit] in bips, sum must equal 10000)

approveSettlement(uint256,uint16[2]).notice: Approve an offer to settle the payment between the buyer and the seller

challenge(uint256).notice: Challenge a payment. If the challenge is successful (the criteria are met), it sets whoever sent the challenge as a payee and sets a new challenge period

constructor.notice: Constructor sets immutable references to the related Unicrow contracts

getSettlementDetails(uint256).notice: Get details about the latest settlement offer

latestSettlementOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Stores information about the splits in the latest offer to settle an escrow identified by its ID

latestSettlementOfferBy(uint256).notice: Stores information about which address sent the latest offer to settle a particular escrow identified by its ID

offerSettlement(uint256,uint16[2]).notice: Send an offer to settle the payment between the buyer and the seller

unicrowClaim().notice: Reference to the contract that manages claims from the escrow
